attributes.action: More Help should be provided for Homeless people around London and Bucks.
attributes.background: Hi, My name is Kim, i study at Princes Risborough School, i am currently taking citizenship for a GSCE and my group are looking at homelessness, Personally our group think there isn't enough help/support put in place for homeless people around the country, Please help us raise an awareness for this.

rejection.details:
Providing support for homeless people is primarily the responsibility of local councils rather than the UK Government. You might want to consider contacting your local council about this issue. 

Alternatively you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may also want to consider signing this existing petition which calls on the Government to increase the funding it gives to local councils to tackle homelessness https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163794
